AG.name: Pokémon™ Sun and Pokémon™ Moon Special Demo
AG.description: This is your chance to meet the Pokémon that can be found in Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon! Ash-Greninja, the Pokémon that appears with the hero Ash in the animated TV series Pokémon the Series: XYZ, will also appear in this game as a member of your team—you can adventure together! You can bring Greninja, which is able to turn into Ash-Greninja, to your full version of Pokémon Sun or Pokémon Moon (after launch) once you’ve completed your adventure together in the Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon Special Demo Version.

AT.name: Pokémon Sonne und Mond: Spezial-Demoversion
AT.description: In der Spezial-Demoversion können Spieler die Alola-Region kennenlernen. Begleitet werden sie dabei von Ash-Quajutsu, dem Pokémon, das in der Pokémon-Zeichentrickserie Pokémon – Die TV-Serie: XYZ zusammen mit dem Helden Ash unterwegs ist. Ash-Quajutsu kann von der Spezial-Demoversion auf die Vollversion von Pokémon Sonne und Pokémon Mond übertragen werden.

BS.name: Pokémon™ Sun and Pokémon™ Moon Special Demo
BS.description: This is your chance to meet the Pokémon that can be found in Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon! Ash-Greninja, the Pokémon that appears with the hero Ash in the animated TV series Pokémon the Series: XYZ, will also appear in this game as a member of your team—you can adventure together! You can bring Greninja, which is able to turn into Ash-Greninja, to your full version of Pokémon Sun or Pokémon Moon (after launch) once you’ve completed your adventure together in the Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon Special Demo Version.

AU.name: Pokémon Sun and Moon Special Demo Version
AU.description: The Special Demo Version introduces players to the Alola region and features Ash-Greninja, the Pokémon that appears alongside the hero Ash in the animated TV series Pokémon the Series: XYZ. Players are able to transfer their Ash-Greninja from the Special Demo Version to their full version of Pokémon Sun or Pokémon Moon.

BZ.name: Pokémon™ Sun and Pokémon™ Moon Special Demo
BZ.description: This is your chance to meet the Pokémon that can be found in Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon! You can bring Greninja, which is able to turn into Ash-Greninja, to your full version of Pokémon Sun or Pokémon Moon (after launch) once you’ve completed your adventure together in the Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon Special Demo Version.

BR.name: Pokémon™ Sun and Pokémon™ Moon Special Demo
BR.description: Esta é a sua chance de conhecer os Pokémon encontrados em Pokémon Sun e Pokémon Moon! Ash-Greninja, o Pokémon que acompanha o nosso herói Ash nas séries de desenho animado de TV “Pokémon, a Série: XYZ”, também participará desta aventura, como membro da sua equipe! Você pode transferir o Greninja, que se transforma em Ash-Greninja, para a sua versão completa de Pokémon Sun ou Pokémon Moon (após o lançamento), uma vez que vocês completarem a sua aventura juntos na versão demo Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon Special Demo Version.

BG.name: Pokémon Sun and Moon Special Demo Version

Players are able to transfer their Ash-Greninja from the Special Demo Version to their full version of Pokémon Sun or Pokémon Moon.

BE.name: Pokémon Soleil et Lune : Version démo spéciale
BE.description: Elle présente aux joueurs la région d’Alola ainsi que Sachanobi, l’Amphinobi qui apparaît aux côtés de Sacha dans les dessins animés Pokémon, la série : XYZ. Il est possible de transférer votre Amphinobi Forme Sacha de la Version démo spéciale vers la version complète.

HK.name: 精靈寶可夢 太陽／月亮 特別體驗版
HK.description: 一邊透過「收集」、「培育」、「對戰」及「交換」不思議的生物寶可夢(Pokémon)，一邊進行冒險的『精靈寶可夢(Pokémon)』系列最新作品。今次的舞台是由溫暖島嶼所形成的阿羅拉地區。 『精靈寶可夢 太陽／月亮 特別體驗版』的故事與正式版不同。 以基本的玩法為首，可體驗威力強勁的招式「Ｚ招式」、尋找寶可夢(Pokémon)並可進行攝影的「寶可搜尋鏡」、可騎著寶可夢(Pokémon)一起冒險的「寶可騎行」等『精靈寶可夢 太陽／月亮』的引人之處。 此外，在『特別體驗版』中，「小智版甲賀忍蛙」將以夥伴寶可夢(Pokémon)的身份登場，一起進行冒險。 可把在『特別體驗版』中一起冒險並變化成「小智版甲賀忍蛙」的甲賀忍蛙帶過去『精靈寶可夢 太陽／月亮』。

JM.name: Pokémon™ Sun and Pokémon™ Moon Special Demo
JM.description: This is your chance to meet the Pokémon that can be found in Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon! Ash-Greninja, the Pokémon that appears with the hero Ash in the animated TV series Pokémon the Series: XYZ, will also appear in this game as a member of your team—you can adventure together! You can bring Greninja, which is able to turn into Ash-Greninja, to your full version of Pokémon Sun or Pokémon Moon (after launch) once you’ve completed your adventure together in the Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon Special Demo Version.

IT.name: Pokémon Sole e Luna: Versione demo speciale
IT.description: È la tua occasione per scoprire in anteprima la regione di Alola e incontrare Greninja Forma Ash, il fido compagno del protagonista della serie animata Serie Pokémon XYZ. Questo Pokémon speciale può essere trasferito nella versione completa di Pokémon Sole e Pokémon Luna.

KN.name: Pokémon™ Sun and Pokémon™ Moon Special Demo
KN.description: This is your chance to meet the Pokémon that can be found in Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon! Ash-Greninja, the Pokémon that appears with the hero Ash in the animated TV series Pokémon the Series: XYZ, will also appear in this game as a member of your team—you can adventure together! You can bring Greninja, which is able to turn into Ash-Greninja, to your full version of Pokémon Sun or Pokémon Moon (after launch) once you’ve completed your adventure together in the Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon Special Demo Version.

KR.name: 포켓몬스터썬・문 특별체험판
KR.description: 『포켓몬스터썬・문 특별체험판』은 다운로드하여 즐기실 수 있습니다. 『포켓몬스터썬・문』제품판은 패키지를 구입하여 즐겨 주십시오. 신비한 생명체인 포켓몬을 「모으고」「키우고」「배틀하고」「교환」해가면서 모험하는 『포켓몬스터』 시리즈의 최신작. 이번에는 온난한 기후의 섬들로 이루어진 알로라지방이 무대입니다. 『포켓몬스터썬・문 특별체험판』은 제품판과는 다른 스토리로 이루어져있습니다. 기본 플레이 방법을 시작으로, 절대적인 위력을 가진 「Z기술」, 포켓몬을 발견해서 촬영할 수 있는 「포켓파인더」, 포켓몬을 타고 함께 모험할 수 있는 「포켓라이드」 등 『포켓몬스터썬・문』의 매력을 체험할 수 있습니다. 또한, 『특별체험판』에서는 애니메이션 『포켓몬스터 XY&Z』에서 주인공 지우의 포켓몬으로 활약 중인 「지우개굴닌자」가 파트너 포켓몬으로 등장하여, 함께 모험을 할 수 있습니다. 『특별체험판』에서 함께 모험을 한 “지우개굴닌자”로 변할 수 있는 개굴닌자는 『포켓몬스터썬・문』에 데려가는 것이 가능합니다.

KY.name: Pokémon™ Sun and Pokémon™ Moon Special Demo
KY.description: This is your chance to meet the Pokémon that can be found in Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon! Ash-Greninja, the Pokémon that appears with the hero Ash in the animated TV series Pokémon the Series: XYZ, will also appear in this game as a member of your team—you can adventure together! You can bring Greninja, which is able to turn into Ash-Greninja, to your full version of Pokémon Sun or Pokémon Moon (after launch) once you’ve completed your adventure together in the Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon Special Demo Version.

LC.name: Pokémon™ Sun and Pokémon™ Moon Special Demo
LC.description: This is your chance to meet the Pokémon that can be found in Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon! Ash-Greninja, the Pokémon that appears with the hero Ash in the animated TV series Pokémon the Series: XYZ, will also appear in this game as a member of your team—you can adventure together! You can bring Greninja, which is able to turn into Ash-Greninja, to your full version of Pokémon Sun or Pokémon Moon (after launch) once you’ve completed your adventure together in the Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon Special Demo Version.

JP.name: ポケットモンスター サン・ムーン 特別体験版
JP.description: 不思議な生き物ポケモンを「集めたり」「育てたり」「バトルしたり」「交換したり」しながら冒険する『ポケットモンスター』シリーズの最新作。今回は、温暖な島々からなる、アローラ地方が舞台です。 『ポケットモンスター サン・ムーン 特別体験版』は、製品版とは異なるストーリーになっています。 基本の遊びかたをはじめ、絶大な威力の技「Ｚワザ」、ポケモンを見つけ、撮影できる「ポケファインダー」、ポケモンに乗って一緒に冒険できる「ポケモンライド」など『ポケットモンスター サン・ムーン』の魅力を体験することができます。 また、『特別体験版』では、アニメ『ポケットモンスター XY&Z』で、主人公サトシのポケモンとして活躍する「サトシゲッコウガ」が仲間のポケモンとして登場し、一緒に冒険します。 『特別体験版』で一緒に冒険した“サトシゲッコウガ”になることのできるゲッコウガは、『ポケットモンスター サン・ムーン』に連れていくことができます。

RU.name: Pokémon Sun and Moon Special Demo Version
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. Специальная демо-версия знакомит игроков с регионом Алола и представляет Эша-Грениндзю – Покемона, который появляется вместе с главным героем Эшем в телевизионном Покемон Сериале: XYZ. Пользователи могут переместить Эша-Грениндзю из специальной демо-версии в полную версию игр Pokémon Sun или Pokémon Moon.

TW.name: 精靈寶可夢 太陽／月亮 特別體驗版
TW.description: 一邊透過「收集」、「培育」、「對戰」及「交換」不思議的生物寶可夢(Pokémon)，一邊進行冒險的『精靈寶可夢(Pokémon)』系列最新作品。今次的舞台是由溫暖島嶼所形成的阿羅拉地區。 『精靈寶可夢 太陽／月亮 特別體驗版』的故事與正式版不同。 以基本的玩法為首，可體驗威力強勁的招式「Ｚ招式」、尋找寶可夢(Pokémon)並可進行攝影的「寶可搜尋鏡」、可騎著寶可夢(Pokémon)一起冒險的「寶可騎行」等『精靈寶可夢 太陽／月亮』的引人之處。 此外，在『特別體驗版』中，「小智版甲賀忍蛙」將以夥伴寶可夢(Pokémon)的身份登場，一起進行冒險。 可把在『特別體驗版』中一起冒險並變化成「小智版甲賀忍蛙」的甲賀忍蛙帶過去『精靈寶可夢 太陽／月亮』。

VI.description: This is your chance to meet the Pokémon that can be found in Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon! Ash-Greninja, the Pokémon that appears with the hero Ash in the animated TV series Pokémon the Series: XYZ, will also appear in this game as a member of your team—you can adventure together! You can bring Greninja, which is able to turn into Ash-Greninja, to your full version of Pokémon Sun or Pokémon Moon (after launch) once you’ve completed your adventure together in the Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon Special Demo Version.

movies.name: Pokémon Sun & Pokémon Moon Special Demo Version Video

ZA.name: Pokémon Sun and Moon Special Demo Version
ZA.description: The Special Demo Version introduces players to the Alola region and features Ash-Greninja, the Pokémon that appears alongside the hero Ash in the animated TV series Pokémon the Series: XYZ. Players are able to transfer their Ash-Greninja from the Special Demo Version to their full version of Pokémon Sun or Pokémon Moon.
